item.title: PARA
item.description: score:22 Chances: Netflix and Disney stocks have soared to 52-week highs driven by the booming streaming industry. Netflix’s subscriber growth initiatives, such as combating password sharing and introducing ad-supported subscription tiers, show strong potential for further growth. Disney’s moderated streaming losses and plans to achieve streaming profitability by year’s end are catalysts driving stock gains.
